list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a boat or ship for conveying passengers and goods, especially over a relatively short distance and as a regular service.
convey in a ferry or other ship or boat, especially across a short stretch of water.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: riverboats ferried weekend picnickers to the park
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Riverboats Ferried Picnickers cuối tuần đến công viên
